name: Cadbury Flake 99 Cones 4 X 125Ml
description: Biscuit Cone with Chocolate Flavour Coating Filled with Vanilla Flavour Ice Cream, Milk Chocolate Flake Bar and Topped with Milk Chocolate Curls
ingredients: Biscuit Cone (13%) (Wheat Flour, Sugar, Coconut Oil, Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin), Salt, Colour (Plain Caramel))
Milk Chocolate Flake Bar (10%) (Milk, Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Vegetable Fats (Palm, Shea), Emulsifier (E442), Flavourings)
Chocolate Flavour Coating (6%) (Coconut Oil, Sugar, Dried Whey (from Milk), Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder, Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin))
Milk Chocolate (1.5%) (Milk, Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Palm Oil, Emulsifiers (E442, E476), Flavouring)
Milk Chocolate Curls (1.5%) (Sugar, Cocoa Mass, Cocoa Butter, Dried Whole Milk, Dried Skimmed Milk, Flavouring, Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin))
PromotionDescription: 50p off Tesco branded ice cream and gelato (includes Tesco finest* and Everyday Value)
